default.controls.items.0.label: Which product looks most attractive?
default.controls.items.0.options.0.label: A
default.controls.items.0.options.1.label: B
default.controls.items.0.options.2.label: Images didn't load
default.controls.items.1.label: Please explain why you chose it.
description:
The component displays several data blocks of the same width on a single horizontal panel. For example, you can use this to compare several photos. 

You can add selection buttons or a field for comment under the compared elements.

[View example in the sandbox](https://ya.cc/t/buBN71oL3twVaP)

Differences from the [layout.compare](layout.compare.md) component:
* You can add buttons which allow hiding the elements. Use it if you need to compare, for example, 5 photos at once and need to choose between two.
* You can configure only common control elements. You can't add separate buttons under each of the compared element.
properties.controls.description:
Components that let Tolokers perform the required actions.

For example: [field.checkbox-group](field.checkbox-group.md) or [field.button-radio-group](field.button-radio-group.md).
properties.items.items.description: A component for data output or input. For example, [view.image](view.image.md).
properties.minItemWidth.description: The minimum width of a data block, at least 400 pixels.
shortDescription: The component displays several data blocks of the same width on a single horizontal panel.
